title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Web-Based Problem-Centered Pharmacotherapy for Patients with Mental Disorders

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of psychiatry and pharmacology, and experience in clinical case analysis
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model appropriate pharmacological treatment plans through case analysis of patients with mental disorders.
Learners can quantitatively evaluate drug interactions and side effects using web-based tools.
Learners can improve the accuracy of pharmacological treatment protocols by over 30% through peer feedback and instructor evaluation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
